trans-unit.source: Converts WSDL-based policies and contracts about message encoding into descriptions of the binding elements that can implement these policies for the service.
Override this class to extend the standard mapping between WSDL and a message encoding binding element.
Then attach your custom object to a `WsdlImporter` either programmatically or by using an application configuration file.

You can also attach your custom object to the internal `WsdlImporter` used by the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/service-trace-viewer-tool-svctraceviewer-exe.md) using an application configuration file.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlImportExtension%23BeforeImport%2A> method to directly modify the metadata that is then imported into message encoding binding elements.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter"></xref> class.
Defines a method that can import custom policy assertions for message encoding and that adds the binding elements that implement the policy.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter"></xref> that imports the metadata information.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> object that contains the policy assertions that can be imported and the collections of binding elements to which custom binding elements that implement the encoding policy can be added.
importer or policyContext is `null`.
Called prior to importing the metadata documents associated with the encoding.
This method is used to inspect, modify and interpret the policy and WSDL before the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter> does the import.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> that describes the services.
The that contains the schema for the wsdlDocuments.
The <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that contains the policy elements.
Called when importing a contract.
The contract importer.
The import context.
Maps the custom WSDL extensions for encoding messages to the service description.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> that imports the WSDL extensions.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext"></xref> that provides the context for the mapping.
